commit.message:
Restore documentation

The original man page is brought back as is, but the rest of the GNU
required files (e.g. the generic INSTALL instructions) are replaced
by a concise guide in the README.
Reorganize project into a GNU-like structure

Merge pull request #29 from slatchurie/fix-memory-leak

fix memory leak

commit.message:
fix memory leak

The memory usage of xiccd was quickly growing when switching between
different display layouts or hotplugging screens.

Fixing the issue by calling g_object_unref on the variable icc in the
function update_device_cb.

Merge pull request #27 from slatchurie/fix-race-2

randr: fix race condition

commit.message:
randr: fix race condition

If xiccd was set to be launched at startup, a race condition could
occur.
randr_conn_private_update could be called twice when the program was
initialized and X events were received at the same time, leading to
incoherent results.

This prevents the issue by starting to process X events after the data
has been initialized.

Merge pull request #24 from slatchurie/fix-x-atom

properly set _ICC_PROFILE for multiple screens

commit.message:
randr: don't miss any XRandR events

g_unix_fd_add was missing every event that was sent during the
execution of randr_conn_private_update.
On some desktop environments, infos such as primary and crtc were
sometimes outdated when a screen was hotplugged, leading to possible
inconsistencies (e.g. XRRSetCrtcGamma applied to the wrong screen).

Replacing g_unix_fd_add with a custom GSource in order to catch every
event, as GDK does.

properly set _ICC_PROFILE atom for multiple screens

Set the _ICC_PROFILE atom properly (use the profile of the primary
screen if available, otherwise make a compromise).
Update it every time a screen is plugged/unplugged or the layout has
changed.

Merge pull request #25 from slatchurie/fix-chrome

xiccd: load the full profile into the _ICC_PROFILE atom

commit.message:
xiccd: load the full profile into the _ICC_PROFILE atom

The profile wasn't loaded entirely into the _ICC_PROFILE X atom.
Informations needed by some apps were missing, such as the primaries for
Chromium.

Change the flags to copy the full profile.
